price: Kuma sulaimãn ya gãji Dãwũda ya ce: "Yã ku mutãne! An sanar da mu maganar tsuntsãye, kuma an bã mu daga kõwane abu. Lalle ne wannan haƙĩƙa shi ne falalar (Allah) bayyananna."
arabic: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيۡمَٰنُ دَاوُۥدَۖ وَقَالَ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ عُلِّمۡنَا مَنطِقَ ٱلطَّيۡرِ وَأُوتِينَا مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wawaritha sulaymānu dāwūda waqāla yāayyuhā al-nāsu ʿullim'nā manṭiqa al-ṭayri waūtīnā min kulli shayin inna hādhā lahuwa al-faḍlu al-mubīnu
